heading0.title: General use
heading0.clause0: It is advised to never share HAR files as they might contain private data such as IP address and cookies.
heading0.clause1: The site is distributed AS IS without any warranties. You are fully responsible for use of this site.
heading0.clause2: You're free to share, copy and modify the site, but you are not allowed to distribute it or any of it's parts without explicit approval.
heading0.clause3: You agree to limit data collection from the game to reasonable amounts.
heading0.clause4: You agree to follow the Shakes & Fidget Terms and Conditions
heading0.clause5: You are not allowed to automate any part of this tool.

heading1.title: Endpoint
heading1.clause0: Endpoint is a Unity application bundled with the tool that allows you to log into the game and collect limited data about yourself and your guild members without the lengthy process of creating a HAR file.
heading1.clause1: It is not possible to capture any other players than those listed above.
heading1.clause2: Everything happens locally in a identical way to playing the game through browser.

heading2.title: Integrated share service
heading2.clause0: All data shared via the integrated share function is not protected in any other way other than the share key.
heading2.clause1: The shared data might be deleted at any point of time, up to full 2 days.

heading3.title: Sentry
heading3.clause0: All errors raised during use of this tool will be reported via Sentry.io tool.
heading3.clause1: These reports are anonymous so that it's not possible to track their origin.
heading3.clause2: Please note that certain ad-blockers might prevent Sentry from working.
heading3.clause3: If you want to contribute to this project I recommend disabling ad-blockers for this site.

endpoint.clause0: Endpoint is a small Unity application bundled with the tool that allows you to log into the game and collect limited game data without the lengthy process of creating a HAR file.
endpoint.clause1: All data entered is sent directly to the game server without involvement of any 3rd party.
endpoint.clause2: It is not possible to capture any other players than those explicitly stated within the application.
endpoint.clause3: All data collection is done using normal means, without any use of forbidden actions.
endpoint.clause4: You can access your S&F Account using your username and password.
endpoint.clause5: You can access your unbound character using your character name and server url in the following format: charname@s1.sfgame.de.

rejected.title: Terms not accepted
rejected.message: You must accept the terms in order to continue

share.title: File export
share.public: Export only public data (regardless of your current global setting)
share.expire: O código irá automaticamente expirar após 2 dias.
share.single_use_notice: Por favor considera manter esta opção ativada a não ser que tenciones partilhar o ficheiro com várias pessoas.

recovery.title: Recuperação
recovery.description#:
Com as opções abaixo, você pode exportar e importar todos os dados armazenados no site.
É recomendável exportar os seus dados pelo menos uma vez por mês para evitar a perda acidental de dados.
recovery.toast: Processo de recuperação iniciado. Por favor, tenha em mente que pode levar um longo tempo, dependendo do tamanho do seu ficheiro de recuperação.
recovery.notice:
Tem a certeza de que deseja recuperar Ferramentas SFTools deste ficheiro?

Esta operação apagará todos os seus dados existentes para prosseguir!

generate.iterations: Quantidade de iterações por thread ao gerar um mapa de animais de estimação.
generate.tooltip: Gera um mapa de sucesso de nível / gladiador. Só é possível com a própria mascote contra uma masmorra.
